# Reasons to use R

+ Statistics
  + Highest functional capability.
  + Up to date and bug free.
+ Free
+ Open source
  + Anyone can contribute
  + Transparency
  + Replicability
+ Strong supportive community
+ Literate Programming
+ Share your work and collaborate.
